SEARCH
Package com.greenloop.event_service.services

Class EventAttendeeService

java.lang.Object
com.greenloop.event_service.services.EventAttendeeService
@Service @Transactional public class EventAttendeeService extends Object
Service layer for managing event attendee operations.

Handles attendee registration, deregistration, attendance tracking via QR codes, and attendee status queries. All operations are transactional to ensure data consistency.

Version:
1.0
Author:
GreenLoop Team

  • Method Details

    • registerAttendee

      public EventAttendeeResponse registerAttendee(UUID eventId, UUID userid, String userEmail)
      Registers a user as an attendee for an event.

      Validates that the user is not already registered and that the event has available capacity.

      Parameters:
      eventId - the UUID of the event
      userid - the UUID of the user to register
      userEmail - the email of the user to register
      Returns:
      EventAttendeeResponse containing the registration details
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - if the event does not exist
      AlreadyRegisteredException - if the user is already registered for this event
      EventFullException - if the event is at full capacity

    • getAllEventAttendees

      public List<EventAttendeeResponse> getAllEventAttendees(UUID eventId)
      Retrieves all attendees registered for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the UUID of the event
      Returns:
      list of all attendees for the event
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - if the event does not exist

    • isUserRegistered

      public boolean isUserRegistered(UUID eventId, UUID userId)
      Checks if a user is registered for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the UUID of the event
      userId - the UUID of the user
      Returns:
      true if user is registered, false otherwise

    • deregisterAttendee

      public void deregisterAttendee(UUID eventId, UUID userId)
      Deregisters a user from an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the UUID of the event
      userId - the UUID of the user to deregister
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the attendee record does not exist

    • markAttendanceByToken

      public EventAttendeeResponse markAttendanceByToken(ScanRequest req, UUID userId, String userEmail)
      Marks a user's attendance at an event using a QR code token.

      Validates that:

      • The event is in ONGOING status
      • The user is registered for the event
      • The user has not already marked attendance

      Parameters:
      req - the scan request containing the QR token
      userId - the UUID of the user marking attendance
      userEmail - the email of the user marking attendance
      Returns:
      EventAttendeeResponse with updated attendance details
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the event or attendee record is not found
      InvalidEventStateException - if the event is not in ONGOING status
      AttendeeNotRegisteredException - if the user did not register for the event
      AttendanceAlreadyMarkedException - if the user already marked attendance

    • getEventAttendeeById

      public EventAttendeeResponse getEventAttendeeById(UUID eventId, UUID userId)
      Retrieves a specific attendee record for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the UUID of the event
      userId - the UUID of the user/attendee
      Returns:
      EventAttendeeResponse containing the attendee details
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the attendee record does not exist
